reviewText: The product was weak and disappointing.  The message was tepid I didn't see any "power" in it.
Veronica is a really good teacher and I enjoyed this dvd a lot and would recommend it to those who want more confidence,her simplicity is so truthful.

I found this video to be very good, it had some things I hadn't heard before in it. i think everyone could benefit from viewing this film, it is from a seminar perspective but you are the only person so Veronica is standing there with her charts and talking just to you, there is some seminar footage from a seminar too.

I enjoyed this, I believe you will too.
The title catch my attention the first time. I recommend this video to anyone that wants to have a leap of confidence.

Full Confidence delivers a reasoned and powerful message in such a warm and loving way that it is profoundly moving and inspiring, showing parents, teachers and trainers how to nurture at a deep level, while building self esteem in everyone who watches. The filming too is sensitive and delicate, a message in itself of reverence for humanity, nature and beauty, lingering on the delights of Argentina. For presenters, it includes a generous list of spectacular quotations from sages through the ages. A gentle masterpiece!FULL CONFIDENCE Overcoming fear with the Power of Love

FULL CONFIDENCE is useful for me as a parent, as an educator and trainer, as a friend and perhaps most of all as a person.  It speaks to all of us. It encourages us - and gives us tools - to reach our potential.  Vernica de Andrs has a unique ability to touch our hearts.  She is making a difference in the world.
